item.description: Trailhead:Take I93 exit 28 for NH Route 49 east.About 5 miles east of I93 make a left onto Upper Mad River Road,make a right onto Orris Road.We will hike the trail counter clockwise.50% of the hike will have views,a rarity in the wooded Northeast.It's one of those modest effort-great reward hikes.This is a moderate hike.4.4 miles round trip,elevation gain 1800 feet,5 hours estimated time.As a condition of attending this meetup you agree to release,hold harmless,and indemnify the organizer(s)and all members of this group from any and all claims for property damage,injury,illness and/death,including those caused by negligence and or other reasons.You also agree to assume all risk associated with this meetup and agree to know and follow the Hiker Responsibility Code described at www.hikesafe.com Steve
item.how_to_find_us: Black Colorado pick up truck NH2431202
item.name: WELCH-DICKEY LOOP
